name: Flat
definition: A musical symbol lowers a pitch by one half step.
topic: Review: The Notes On A Keyboard

name: Middle C
definition: The fourth C key from the left on a standard 88-key piano keyboard. Designated as C4 in scientific pitch notation and is note number 60 in MIDI notation.
topic: Review: The Notes On A Keyboard

name: Octave
definition: The interval between a musical pitch and another with double or half its frequency. These notes will have the same letter name and pitch class.
topic: Review: The Notes On A Keyboard

name: Interval
definition: The difference in pitch between two sounds. This difference is a melodic interval if the two pitches sound successively and a harmonic interval if the pitches sound simultaneously.

name: Window
definition: A type of a function that tracks amplitiude over time.

name: Grain
definition: A very short, windowed excerpt of a sound file.
